auth.registration.payment.how_to_pay: How would you like to pay ?

auth.registration.account_access: How would you like to access your account ?
auth.forgot_password.explanation: No problem, provide your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

auth.registration.tell_us_about_you: To begin, tell us a bit about you !
auth.validate.proceed: It's time to take control of your personnal finances !
error.stripe.unavailable: Our secured payments system is currently unavailable, please try again later.
error.registration.required_fields_missi: Every field is required, please make sure to complete the form.
error.registration.weak_or_password_mism: Your password doesn't meet our security standards and/or your passwords don't match.
error.registration.missing_payment: You've selected a Premium subscribtion, please provide a payment method.
error.registration.invalid_cc_expiration: Please provide a valid expiration for your payment method.
error.registration.terms_and_conditions_: You must accept our terms of use and our privacy policies to continue.
error.registration.failed_to_validate: We cannot validate your account at the moment, please try again later.
error.registration.email_not_unique: This email is already in use.
error.registration.username_not_unique: This username is already in use.
error.registration.failed_to_validate_fo: If the problem persists, please contact us.
error.registration.failed_to_create_acco: We can't create your account at this time, please try again later.
error.registration.validation_link_expir: This validation link has expired, we sent you a new validation email, please check your inbox.
auth.check_inbox.title: Check your inbox !
auth.check_inbox.confirm_email: To access all the platform's functionnalities, you need to confirm your email.
error.check_inbox.unable_to_send_email: Unable to send the email. Please try again in a few seconds.
auth.reset_password.title: Reset your password
error.mailing.failed_to_send: We are unable to send the link, please try again later.
